alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sullivan, southeastern Scott and southwestern Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 530 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingsport, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Gate City, Weber City, Walnut Hill, Colonial Heights, Blountville, Sullivan Gardens and Warriors Path State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
